Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said.`` The time to deny any and all funding to Planned Parenthood is now.'' Sergio Marchionne found this site to be a fitting location to discuss how compressed natural gas( CNG) could fuel href="http://www.autoblog.com/make/chrysler/"> Chrysler's future. The CEO outlined Chrysler's commitment to CNG development, stating: In the United States, there is a substantial domestic supply of CNG. CNG technology is readily available without extensive development time or expenditure of resources. Fiat already has a portfolio of CNG engines, both naturally aspirated and turbocharged. Chrysler Powertrain is actively investigating applications for CNG and is exploring solutions that would drive people to the technology. New York Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand 's request. The two women and House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room holding her hand when her eye fluttered open. Kirsten Gillibrand told reporters the congresswomen were telling Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better. Gabrielle Giffords was gripping their hands,`` and the more we joked about what we were going to do, she started to open her eyes.''
